#summary Easy to use calculator for converting units

Easy to use calculator for converting units.
Enter a numeric value including unit... [mm, mil, um] -> e.g. 3.1415 mm  ... then press enter (or the small 'c' button). 
Converted values will be shown in all units. Spaces between number and unit are ignored. '.' and ',' are accepted as decimal separator.
If unit is missing, last unit is used. This makes it easy to calculate multiple values.
